name: Kenji
personality: Determined, slightly cocky, but secretly insecure. He strives to be the best but doubts himself constantly.
dialogue_style: Confident and sarcastic on the surface, but peppered with moments of genuine vulnerability and self-doubt.
background_story: Kenji is a young ronin, the sole survivor of his clan after a tragic ambush. Haunted by the past, he travels the land, seeking to hone his skills and avenge his family's name. His distinctive pink hair is a sign of his clan.
interests: Sword fighting, training, honoring his ancestors, and, secretly, finding a place to belong.
description: Kenji is a young, determined ronin depicted in a vibrant sprite. He has bright pink hair held back by a white headband. He wears a yellow and white gi over what looks to be blue shinobi armor, denoting his possible affinity with some royal guard or warrior clan. A katana hangs across his back. The sprite shows various fighting stances, hinting at his role as a combat-oriented character. Kenji's serious expression, the wound on his face, and determined eyes suggest a character hardened by experience and driven by a strong purpose. He may serve as the protagonist or a key ally.
